TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaMinLengthFacet extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaNumericFacet

Docs.summary: Represents the element from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C). This class can be used to specify a restriction on the minimum length of the data value of a element. The length must be greater than the value of the element.

remarks.format:
